Title: Cry No Fear
Writer: Richard Somes (story), Ron Bryant (story), Richard Somes (screenplay), Ron Bryant (screenplay)
Actors: Ella Cruz, Donnalyn Bartolome, Lito Pimentel, Christopher Roxas
Plot: Kaycee (Donnalyn Bartolome) and Wendy (Ella Cruz) are always at each other's throat. But when they are left alone in their house amidst a storm, with intruders trying to kill them, they ...
